trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: Representerer metoden som håndterer den <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView"> </xref> rutet hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Handling this event is typically only done within elements that support a scrollable region, or otherwise deliberately set their rendering size smaller than the combined desired size of their child element content, and is only done by deliberately handling the event once it has routed upwards in the element tree and has reached the first parent that offers scrolling region support.
trans-unit.target: Behandler denne hendelsen gjøres vanligvis bare i elementer som støtter en rullbare område, eller hvis med hensikt Sett gjengivelse størrelsen mindre enn kombinert ønsket størrelse på innholdet underordnet element og bare utføres av med hensikt behandling av hendelsen når den har rutet oppover i treet elementet og har nådd den første overordnet som gir støtte for rullende område.

trans-unit.source: An existing implementation that handles scrolling regions in a manner that is typically desirable for user controls is <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>.
trans-unit.target: Er en eksisterende implementering som behandler Rulleområder på en måte som er vanligvis ønskelig for brukerkontroller <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: If you derive from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>, you can register a class handler for <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView?displayProperty=fullName> and supplement the base class handling of the event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du avledes fra <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>, kan du registrere et klassen behandlingsprogram for <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView?displayProperty=fullName>og tillegg basisklassen håndtering av hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: You should also consider using or class-handling the class-defined <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollChanged> event instead of <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Du bør også vurdere å bruke eller klassen behandling klassen brukerdefinert <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollChanged>hendelsen i stedet for <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollChanged>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, if you create an entirely custom class that does not derive from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>, you can still add class handling by calling <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A?displayProperty=fullName> in your class instantiation.
trans-unit.target: Alternativt, hvis du oppretter en helt egendefinerte klasse ikke er avledet fra <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>, kan du fremdeles legge til klassen som behandler ved å kalle <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A?displayProperty=fullName>i klassen-forekomst.</xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: For details on class handling, see [Marking Routed Events as Handled, and Class Handling](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Mer informasjon om behandling av klassen [merke rutet hendelser som Handled og behandling av klassen](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Content elements can cause the event to be raised by their content hosts (through calling <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.BringIntoView%2A> and raising <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView?displayProperty=fullName> from the content host).
trans-unit.target: Innholdselementer kan føre til at den-hendelsen av deres innhold verter (via kaller <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.BringIntoView%2A>og vise <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView?displayProperty=fullName>fra innhold verten).</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.BringIntoView%2A>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, you can request logical tree elements to be brought into view with the helper method <xref:System.Windows.LogicalTreeHelper.BringIntoView%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: På samme måte kan du be om logiske tre elementene som skal hentes inn i visningen med metoden helper <xref:System.Windows.LogicalTreeHelper.BringIntoView%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.LogicalTreeHelper.BringIntoView%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> implements a related but different method <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox.ScrollIntoView%2A>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>implementerer en beslektede, men annen metode <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox.ScrollIntoView%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox.ScrollIntoView%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>
